keyword: how many calories in a head of cauliflower
title: How Many Calories in a Head of Cauliflower?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a head of cauliflower, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat breakdown per 100 g basis, totals, and preparation tweaks for better nutrition tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Head of Cauliflower?
assumptions: Average head of cauliflower (~500 g), raw, white variety, no added seasonings or oils.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety (e.g., colored cauliflower), freshness, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One average head of cauliflower provides ~125 kcal and ~10 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a head of cauliflower?
faqs.a: About 125 kcal for an average 500 g head.
Yes, ~25 g carbs per head, with 10 g fiber, making net carbs ~15 g.

faqs.q: How much fiber in a head of cauliflower?
faqs.a: Around 10 g of dietary fiber, supporting digestion.

faqs.q: Does cooking change calories in cauliflower?
faqs.a: Minimal change if no added fats; steaming or boiling keeps it low-cal.

faqs.q: What size is an average head of cauliflower?
faqs.a: Typically 500 g; smaller heads ~300 g (75 kcal), larger ~700 g (175 kcal).
